metadata.title: CVE-2020-10719 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Undertow in versions before 2.1.1.Final, regarding theprocessing of invalid HTTP requests with large chunk sizes. This flawallows an attacker to take advantage of HTTP request smuggling.

criterions.comment: undertow package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
